p: In the different cannabis varieties, the total amount of THC and CBD ( Supplementary Table S5) are similar to those declared in the literature ( Uso medico della cannabis - Ministero della Sanit√†, 2016; Office of Medicinal Cannabis, 2019) and in labeled content. Some samples deviated from the expected values due to the variability in both the not strictly standardized preparation protocols and the employed plant matrix.
